NIGGA.Definition: a way of saying or writing nigger (= an extremely offensive word for a black person)

BLACK.Definition: relating or belonging to people with black or dark brown skin, especially people who live in Africa or whose family originally came from Africa

CLEAR UP.Definition: to give or find an explanation for something, or to deal with a problem or argument

RACIST.Definition: relating to policies, behaviors, rules, etc. that result in a continued unfair advantage to some people and unfair or harmful treatment of others based on race

SLUR.Definition: words intended to insult someone or injure someone's reputation

DEGRADE.Definition: to cause people to feel that they or other people have no value and do not have the respect or good opinion of others

ENDEARMENT.Definition: a word or phrase that you use to show that you love someone

HIP-HOP.Definition: a type of popular music in which the words are spoken rather than sung and the subject of the songs is often politics or society

SEXY.Definition: used to describe something that attracts a lot of interest and excitement

COMPLICATED.Definition: difficult to analyze, understand, or explain

POSSIBLY.Definition: used when something is not certain

OFFENSIVE.Definition: causing someone to be upset or to have hurt feelings

DESCENDANTS.Definition: a person related to someone from an earlier generation (= all the people of about the same age within a particular family)

SLAVES.Definition: a person who is legally owned by someone else and has to work for that person

IN MY HUMBLE OPINION.Definition: phrase used to present one's viewpoint or beliefs with an awareness or cautiousness that the listener might disagree or be offended

AT ALL.Definition: (used to make negatives and questions stronger) in any way or of any type

DESCENT.Definition: the state or fact of being related to a particular person or group of people who lived in the past

WHITE.Definition: belonging to the group of people with skin that is pale in color, who come from or whose family originally came from Europe

IDENTITY POLITICS.Definition: political beliefs and systems that place a lot of importance on the group to which people see themselves as belonging to, especially according to their race, gender (= whether they are male or female), or sexual orientation (= whether they prefer to have sexual relationships with people of the same or a different gender)

ILLUSION.Definition: an idea or belief that is not true

PROGRESS.Definition: movement to an improved or more developed state, or to a forward position

EQUALITY.Definition: the right of different groups of people to have a similar social position and receive the same treatment

BULLSHIT.Definition: complete nonsense or something that is not true

ETHNIC.Definition: relating or belonging to a group of people who can be seen as distinct (= different) because they have a shared culture, tradition, language, history, etc.
